alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 10:05AM CDT until August 07 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Missouri... Meramec River at Pacific. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, farm and pasture land begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday morning and crest near 15.2 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Pacific 15.0 13.7 15.0 15.1 12.6 9.6 6.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
